2021-01-22 15:12
After years of expressing mirth in @SlackHQ with: "ha ha ha" I've finally overcome my muscle memory in favour of: "hahaha" ...because I Iearned that my teammates thought I was being sarcastic. Apparently "ha ha ha" is the golf clap of lol-ing. Proud of my growth as a human.
